name: Gambler
flower_description: A big, luxurious flower that can hide a loaded dice.
feather_description: The tail feather of a large bird. Perfect for discretely concealing a trump card.
sand_description: A shattered pocket watch that once took a lethal hit for its owner.
goblet_description: This vessel was specially made for a single purpose. It has absolutely no secret compartments built into it.
circlet_description: A pair of blue earrings that, when worn, calm the mind and encourage a rational assessment of risks.
four_pc_bonus: Defeating an opponent has a 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.
